short_summary: Wharf Reconstruction in Prosser Rock, NL
description: the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material to perform the required work
full_summary:
## Wharf Reconstruction Project
### Title
  F6140-231330 Wharf Reconstruction (Phase 2) - St. John's (Prosser Rock), NL

### Notice ID
  WS3952365869-Doc3952420131
  Solicitation ID: WS3952365869

### Purchase Description
 The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has a requirement for the second phase of a Wharf Reconstruction in Prosser Rock, NL. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) will administrate the tender process.

### Description
The tender involves the furnishing of all equipment, plant, labour and materials for the reconstruction of a wharf in Prosser Rock, Newfoundland and Labrador. The successful bidder shall provide a complete, final, and fully functional product in accordance with the plans and specifications.

### Classification
  3010-2802: Concrete pilings
  7214-0000: Heavy construction services
  7214-1200: Marine construction services

### Special Conditions
  A bid security as determined by the Contracting Authority will be required of the successful bidder during Phase Two of the project.

### Contact Information
 Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
 620 Laurier St
  Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

  Phone: None
  Email: None

  Contact: Adam Beaumaster
  Email: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice Type
 Invitation to Qualify - Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Submission
 Interested parties must submit an expression of interest to the Contracting Authority by the closing date indicated above. The Authority reserves the right to invite selected bidders to participate in the tender process.

### Closing Date and Time
 The close date and time for submission of bid is 2023-5-1, at 2:00 p.m.

### Delivery Location
 Worksite: St. John's (Prosser Rock), Newfunding and Labrador

Note: It was mentioned that the exchange, i.e contract had already expired, I kept it in to show the record/existing situation, however, note that this information should be updated as it is crucial for submitting and providing the tender entries.


__The End__. I kept the contact information with your name and email as it was. If it doesn't comply with government regulations, it should be stripped off to avoid potential misrepresent
